name: CONTACT_INFO_LIST_STRUCTURE
description: Defines the structure for a list of contact information entries, each linked to a specific passenger via the IndividualRef element. Includes details such as contact type, phone numbers, and email addresses.
prompt: Verify that each <ContactInfo> in <ContactInfoList> has a unique <ContactInfoID>, a <ContactTypeText>, and either a <Phone> or <EmailAddress> element. Ensure that <IndividualRef> correctly references a valid <PaxID> from the PaxList.
